from sklearn.ensemble import RandomForestRegressor, AdaBoostRegressor

sgd = SGDRegressor()
adc = AdaBoostRegressor(base_estimator= rf, n_estimators=50, learning_rate=1.0)
gb = GradientBoostingRegressor()
